info.name: Platform Of Trust v2 APIs
info.description: Collection for managining PoT v2 APIs

header.description: Optional Authorization. Required to discover private and organization level products.

query.description: Offset of a query. Must be at least 0
Limit the result of a query. Must be between 1 and 100
Query parameter to filter by name and description data
The type of products to be returned
Visibility of the products to be listed (public, private, organization)
By default some of the models are included as an id or product code reference in the endpoint response. Use this query parameter to include the complete extended models in the response.

header.description: Indicate the media type of the resource.

variable.description: (Required) Product code is a unique identifier used to invoke a particular data product. Must not contain spaces.

item.name: DataSource

query.description: Offset of a query. Must be at least 0
Limit the result of a query. Must be between 1 and 100
Query parameter to filter by name and description data
The type of products to be returned
By default some of the models are included as an id or product code reference in the endpoint response. Use this query parameter to include the complete extended models in the response.

header.description: Indicate the media type of the resource.

body.raw:
{
    "productCode": "example-data-source-product-code",
    "type": "datasource",
    "name": "Example data source",
		"description": "Example description of the data source",
		"imageUrl": null, 
    "publisherOrganizationId": "32615d6b-c88e-4606-ae39-2131ed6d8912",
    "connectorProductCode": "example-connector-product-code", 
    "transformerProductCodes": [
        "example-transformer-product-code"
    ],
    "protocol": "https",
    "authType": "basic",
    "accessPoint": "https://example-data-source.com/api",
    "behindVpn": false
}

header.description: Indicate the media type of the resource.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Example data source",

    ],
    "protocol": "https",

    "behindVpn": false
}

item.description: Manage product type of Data Source

header.description: Optional Authorization. Required to discover private and organization level products.

query.description: Offset of a query. Must be at least 0
Limit the result of a query. Must be between 1 and 100
Query parameter to filter by name and description data
The type of products to be returned (dataproduct, datasource, connector, transformer)
Visibility of the products to be listed (public, private, organization)
By default some of the models are included as an id or product code reference in the endpoint response. Use this query parameter to include the complete extended models in the response.

variable.description: (Required) Product code is a unique identifier used to invoke a particular data product. Must not contain spaces.
(Required) Product code is a unique identifier used to invoke a particular data product. Must not contain spaces.

header.description: (Required) The requesting app's JWT token. The token is generated when the app is created.
Platform of Trust OAuth bearer token of the user currently logged in in his application. This is not mandatory, but if passed, the token will be verified.

item.name: Create custom credentials for the current data product

header.description: Indicate the media type of the resource.

body.raw:
{
  "dataSourceProductCode": "example-data-source-product-code",
  "name": "API Key credentials",
  "description": "Credentials for example-data-source",
  "type": "api-key",
  "encrypted": true,
  "key": "x-api-key",
  "value": "abcdef12345",
  "position": "header"
}
